research_datasets.title: Version Detection Patterns in Obfuscated Responses
research_datasets.description: Dataset of obfuscated service responses and their corresponding version information for training AI models
research_datasets.methodology: Collected real-world service responses and manually extracted version information
research_datasets.findings: Identified common patterns in obfuscated responses that can be used to improve version detection accuracy

data_samples.notes: Obfuscated version information in HTTP server header
Version information in custom HTTP header
